name: Cool Gear 28-Ounce Infuser Bottle
categoryPath: Sports & Outdoors/Outdoor Sports/Camping/Camping Accessories/Water Bottles & Hydration

reviews.name: Cool Gear 28-Ounce Infuser Bottle, Green
reviews.reviewText: I stumbled across this in my local store on accident because someone had stuck one down in a bunch of toddler cups. I've been looking at the Zing Anything bottles online but the price has me twitching, so when this rang up $5.88 I was really excited. I got a teal color which isn't shown on the website, and my first creation was strawberry & lemon and it's great! The only reason this doesn't get full marks is that I'm gonna have to hand wash it. It says it's top rack dishwasher safe, but it's too tall for my top rack.
reviews.title: Who needs Zing?

reviews.name: Cool Gear 28-Ounce Infuser Bottle, Green
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this water bottle. I added cucumbers, lemons, mint, and a few strawberries. Left it in the fridge overnight and oh how much better my water is!! Plus you can't beat the $5.88 price tag!
reviews.title: Love this thing!!!

reviews.name: Cool Gear 28-Ounce Infuser Bottle, Green
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this bottle you can put any fruit you wAnt in it and it also holds large quantities of water at a time. Perfect for the gym!
reviews.title: The best
